item.description:
This Thursday's Practice Session will move to this Park on June 28th.

Open to all steppers that regularly attend The Den practice sessions only.

The venue is outdoors, open gazebo with covered top. Dress appropriately for weather conditions, it will occur rain or shine. Wear your Steppers of Boston shirts and gear. The dance floor is polished stone, comfy shoes are a must. Bring your lawn chair and snacks if you like.

We may draw a few spectators, of those folks that just happen to be walking by at the time. Membership to our club has it's privileges.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me wearing my Stepper's shirt & listen for the steppin' tunes

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Annual Steppin' on Common Ground 6/28/12 - 6pm - Class & Practice
